fr.apteryx.imageio.dicom
Class QueryRetrieveSCP.Operation

Object
  QuerySCP.Operation
      QueryRetrieveSCP.Operation
Enclosing class:
QueryRetrieveSCP
public class QueryRetrieveSCP.Operation
extends QuerySCP.Operation

Represents a current query/retrieve operation. Instances of this class are send as argument to the listener methods.

Field Summary
 Identifier identifier
          The received query identifier
 
Method Summary
 boolean isCanceled()
          May be called from the listener methods to know if a cancel request has been received for this operation.
 void sendQueryResponse(int status, DataSet ds)
          Sends a arbitrary query response with the supplied status and dataset.
 void sendQueryResponseFinal()
          Send a query response with the status of Success (0x0000) and no dataset.
 void sendQueryResponsePending(Identifier id)
          Send a query response with the status of Pending (0xFF00) and the dataset of the supplied identifier.
 void sendRetrieveResponse(int status, DataSet ds, int remaining)
          Send an arbitraty retrieve response with the supplied status, dataset, and number of remaining sub-operations.
 void sendRetrieveResponseFinal()
          Send a retrieve response with a status corresponding to the success encountered when sending objects: Success (0x0000), Warnings (0xB000) or Unknown AE (0xA801), and 0 remaining sub-operations.
 void sendRetrieveResponsePending(int remaining)
          Send a retrieve response with the status of Pending (0xFF00), no dataset and the supplied number of remaining sub-operations.

Field Detail

identifier

public final Identifier identifier
The received query identifier

Method Detail

sendRetrieveResponsePending

public void sendRetrieveResponsePending(int remaining)
                                 throws IOException
Send a retrieve response with the status of Pending (0xFF00), no dataset and the supplied number of remaining sub-operations. May be called periodically by QueryRetrieveSCPListener.retrieveReceived(fr.apteryx.imageio.dicom.QueryRetrieveSCP.Operation) before sendRetrieveResponseFinal().

Throws:
IOException

sendRetrieveResponseFinal

public void sendRetrieveResponseFinal()
                               throws IOException
Send a retrieve response with a status corresponding to the success encountered when sending objects: Success (0x0000), Warnings (0xB000) or Unknown AE (0xA801), and 0 remaining sub-operations. The dataset of the response is filled with the failed SOP Instance UID list if there are any. Must be called by QueryRetrieveSCPListener.retrieveReceived(fr.apteryx.imageio.dicom.QueryRetrieveSCP.Operation) when all the objects have been sent.

Throws:
IOException

sendRetrieveResponse

public void sendRetrieveResponse(int status,
                                 DataSet ds,
                                 int remaining)
                          throws IOException
Send an arbitraty retrieve response with the supplied status, dataset, and number of remaining sub-operations.

Throws:
IOException

isCanceled

public boolean isCanceled()
May be called from the listener methods to know if a cancel request has been received for this operation.

sendQueryResponsePending

public void sendQueryResponsePending(Identifier id)
                              throws IOException
Send a query response with the status of Pending (0xFF00) and the dataset of the supplied identifier. Must be called by QueryRetrieveSCPListener.queryReceived(fr.apteryx.imageio.dicom.QueryRetrieveSCP.Operation) or BasicWorklistManagementSCPListener.queryReceived(fr.apteryx.imageio.dicom.BasicWorklistManagementSCP.Operation) when a match is found.

Throws:
IOException

sendQueryResponseFinal

public void sendQueryResponseFinal()
                            throws IOException
Send a query response with the status of Success (0x0000) and no dataset. Must be called by QueryRetrieveSCPListener.queryReceived(fr.apteryx.imageio.dicom.QueryRetrieveSCP.Operation) or BasicWorklistManagementSCPListener.queryReceived(fr.apteryx.imageio.dicom.BasicWorklistManagementSCP.Operation) when the matching process is complete.

Throws:
IOException

sendQueryResponse

public void sendQueryResponse(int status,
                              DataSet ds)
                       throws IOException
Sends a arbitrary query response with the supplied status and dataset. Must be called by QueryRetrieveSCPListener.queryReceived(fr.apteryx.imageio.dicom.QueryRetrieveSCP.Operation) or BasicWorklistManagementSCPListener.queryReceived(fr.apteryx.imageio.dicom.BasicWorklistManagementSCP.Operation) to send abnormal responses (Failed, Refused, Canceled...).

Throws:
IOException
